response.summary: Creative, fastidious, resourceful problem solver with experience across industries from manufacturing, entertainment and construction to service and healthcare.  Able to effectively self-manage during independent projects as well as able to collaborate as part of a product team.

profile_positions.description:
Developed an operation management software for medical equipment maintenance companies. 
Currently used by 3 companies.  3,000+ maintenance requests are processed monthly. Used to maintain medical equipment in 700+ hospitals and clinics. 
Kept track of maintenance requests, programmed technical services. Relevant data such as location, before and after pictures parts replaced, digital signature, automated emails.
Web based software using PHP, MySQL and AWS for file storage.
Currently developing 2nd version using Laravel Framework.
profile_positions.title: CO-OWNER / SOFTWARE DEVELOPER

profile_positions.description: Multiple website developments with advanced functionalities like POS, credit simulators, accounting reports for employees, online orders, dynamic creation of pages for SEO, integrations with PayPal, Google APIs and AWS.
profile_positions.title: COSTUME WEBSITES

profile_positions.description:
Compiled infrastructure data from public databases.  Analyzed data to assess risks of delayed deadlines and cost overages for future government projects.  
Develop project management software using Laravel, MySQL and AWS for file storage.
profile_positions.title: DATA MINING & SOFWARE DEVELOPER

profile_positions.description: 3D modelling of townhomes, duplexes, single family homes, malls, generating photorealistics renders based on architect’s blueprints.
profile_positions.title: 3D MODEL RENDERING

profile_positions.description:
Designed and built an adjustable bottle cap slicing machine with unique slicing system. Increased productivity 500% with minimal operator intervention. 
Design a blow molding machine with 2 ton of closing force.
profile_positions.title: MACHINE DESIGNER

profile_positions.description:

redes para CC Calima, Armenia.
profile_positions.title: 3D Modeler
